songs.title: Careful Where You Stand
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I feel safe, I feel warm
When you're here, can I do no wrong?
I am cured, when I'm by your side
I'm all right, I'm all right
I am safe when I am with you
And I feel warm if you want me to
I am cured, when I'm by your side
I'm all right

[Chorus]
Careful where you stand, my love
Careful where you lay your head
It's true, we're always
Looking out for one another

[Verse 2]
I feel safe when I am with you
And I feel warm when you want me too
I am cured when you are around
I'm alright

[Chorus]
Careful where you stand, my love
Careful where you lay your head
It's true, we're always
Looking out for one another

[Outro]
So I'd like a quiet time, please
Yeah I'd like a quiet time

Ooh, ah ooh, ah ooh
Ooh, ah ooh, ah ooh
And careful where you stand
And careful where you stand
